title: Attack moving
body:
Hello all, hope someone can help me out.

I recently have reset all my settings for in-game, since I was not able to ping items from the shop. However, this also did reset my settings for attack-moving. You can probably imagine how much of a pain in the *** this is for an adc main!

The problem is not that I am not able to attack move, but that when I attack move, I attack the target closest to me, and not the target the closest to where I clicked my cursor. It used to do that before the reset.

When I am kiting in a fight, or last hitting minons, I often attack the wrong target when attack moving now. I will attach a screenshot of my key bindings, and I hope that someone can help me out here.

By the way, first post. Please be constructive if I did something wrong!

https://imgur.com/a/JNXPy

replies.body:
Here's the option you're looking for!

https://i.gyazo.com/abf22443326f6763054a7e140fba2183.png

With "Attack Move on Cursor" turned on like I have here, that will make you target the enemy closest to your mouse cursor when you click!
Thank you so much, this was very helpful :)
